availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: P. L. Netherland (Louisville, Jefferson County, Clerk )

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Clerk in Louisville, Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 5, p. 212
Find A Grave, "P. L. Netherland (June 17,1837-April 20,1889)," Memorial #87816122, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/87816122 (accessed February 04, 2019).
